text: Berles-Monchel is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region in northern France. ==Geography== A village located 11 miles (17 km) northwest of Arras on the D82 junction with the N39 road, in the valley, and the source of the river Scarpe. ==Population== ==Sights== * The eighteenth-century château. * The Wandelicourt chapel, dating from the eighteenth century. * The church of Saint-Pierre, dating from the sixteenth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Berles-Monchel
